description:
Located in Miami, Florida, the law firm of Neufeld, Kleinberg & Pinkiert, PA, has become one of the state's leading legal practices for those who have serious personal injury and wrongful death claims arising from motor vehicle accidents, defective products, dangerous property conditions, medical malpractice and more.

As evidence of the success we have achieved advocating on behalf of our plaintiff injury clients, we have grown to include four total law offices across Florida, and we have earned recognition from TopVerdict.com for having secured some of the largest verdicts ever awarded in the state.

In addition, our attorneys have received top rankings from our peers, and we have received "Superb" client ratings on Avvo as well as numerous testimonials from our satisfied clients. This success is the direct result of our more than 100 years of combined legal experience coupled with our unwavering dedication to those we serve.

There is no reason for you to continue to suffer needlessly due to an accident caused by someone else's negligence. You have rights and options, and the attorneys at Neufeld, Kleinberg & Pinkiert, PA, are ready to help you protect yourself and your loved ones and to improve the likelihood you will receive the full amount of finances you need to cover your medical bills, lost wages and other associated damages.

To find out more, you can call our law office or visit our website to schedule a free case evaluation. We promise to do all we can to increase your chances of obtaining the favorable outcomes you expect and deserve so that you can begin to rebuild your life.
